File libsrc/libmath/sortup.c

Public Functions

sortup 
 void sortup(double *values,
             int n,
             int *sort_order)
Sort by increasing value. The sort order is optionally returned in sort_order[].

Parameters:
values - input array of doubles to sort.
n - the number of doubles in values[].
sort_order - the computed sort order. If sort_order is NULL, it will be ignored.
